languages.text: Кунрад Войгтвир, Мастер шепотов на службе фон Валанциус, любезно предложил лично сопроводить наследника династии к Лорд-капитану Теодоре.

traits.locale_text: Кунрад Войгтвир, Мастер шепотов на службе фон Валанциус, любезно предложил лично сопроводить наследника династии к Лорд-капитану Теодоре.

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.
languages.original_text: Кунрад Войгтвир, Мастер шепотов на службе фон Валанциус, любезно предложил лично сопроводить наследника династии к Лорд-капитану Теодоре.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.
Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.
Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir, Meister des Geflüsters in Diensten der Dynastie von Valancius, hat großzügig angeboten, {mf|den Erben|die Erbin} der Dynastie zu Lord Captain Theodora zu begleiten.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, Meister des Geflüsters in Diensten der Dynastie von Valancius, hat großzügig angeboten, {mf|den Erben|die Erbin} der Dynastie zu Lord Captain Theodora zu begleiten.

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir, le maître des murmures au service des von Valancius, a gracieusement proposé d'escorter l'héritier de la dynastie jusqu'à la seigneure-capitaine Théodora.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, le maître des murmures au service des von Valancius, a gracieusement proposé d'escorter l'héritier de la dynastie jusqu'à la seigneure-capitaine Théodora.

languages.text: 昆拉德·维特威尔，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的低语之主，慷慨地提出将王朝继承人护送到西奥多拉领主舰长那里。
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.

traits.locale_text: 昆拉德·维特威尔，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的低语之主，慷慨地提出将王朝继承人护送到西奥多拉领主舰长那里。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕える囁きの主クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが、王朝の後継者をロード・キャプテンのシオドーラのもとへ送り届けることを快く申し出てくれた。
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕える囁きの主クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが、王朝の後継者をロード・キャプテンのシオドーラのもとへ送り届けることを快く申し出てくれた。

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir, el maestro de susurros al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius, se ha ofrecido generosamente a escoltar a{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de la dinastía hasta la Lord Capitán Theodora.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, el maestro de susurros al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius, se ha ofrecido generosamente a escoltar a{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de la dinastía hasta la Lord Capitán Theodora.

languages.text: Von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet eden Fısıltı Üstadı Kunrad Voigtvir, zarafet gösterip hanedanlığın vârisine Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın yanına dek eşlik etmeyi teklif etti.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, the Master of Whispers serving the von Valancius dynasty, has graciously offered to escort the dynasty heir to Lord Captain Theodora.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet eden Fısıltı Üstadı Kunrad Voigtvir, zarafet gösterip hanedanlığın vârisine Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın yanına dek eşlik etmeyi teklif etti.
